column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Maddy - Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention. I apologize for your experience at our restaurant. Since we opened our shop in March 2015
column2: we have received bi-monthly pest control treatment from Ecolab and ABC Pest Control and Home Service per company policy. In addition
column3: we have always received high marks during our routine health inspections by the City of Houston. And lastly
column4: we hire an independent food safety program called Everclean to perform an additional health
column5: cleanliness and safety audit of our restaurant.
